Package app.Models

Class Position

java.lang.Object
app.Models.Position
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.PositionI, Serializable
public class Position extends Object implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.PositionI
Represents the two-dimensional position of an entity on a Cartesian plane. This class provides functionality to determine relative directions and distance between this position and another specified position.
See Also:
